## Utils.isPage() method

Is the `path` a `page`<!-- -->. `page` is `module` which is imported by the `routes module` as a route. Check [UserConfig.cwd](./packer.userconfig.cwd.md) for what `path` is.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isPage(path: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | string | The <code>path</code> to be test |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

true if the `path` is a `page`
